changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la sécurité ETH: Fixed a bug on ETH security
changelog.md.Sécurité pour les soucis liés à l'ethern: Security for concerns related to ethernet which does not take ip (modification in base 100M/T
changelog.md.Ajout création clé USB de restauration: Added creation of recovery USB key

index.md.Le plugin Atlas vous permet de vous conn: The Atlas plugin allows you to connect from your Atlas to a Wifi network (with or without password
index.md.Pour ce faire, allez dans le plugin Atla: To do this, go to the Atlas plugin, then select the Wifi equipment
index.md.A cet endroit vous pouvez activer puis s: Here you can activate and then select the wifi you want (2
index.md.4Ghz et 5Ghz), puis tapez le mot de pass: 4Ghz and 5Ghz), then type the password and save
index.md.Pour le moment, le plugin prend en compt: For the moment, the plugin only takes into account access with DHCP
index.md.Vous devez brancher une clé usb de plus: You must plug a usb key of more than 10GB into the right USB port (Black) at the bottom
index.md.une fois fait vous pouvez lancer le reco: once done you can launch the key recovery and follow the instructions
index.md.il suffira de mettre admin\/admin puis m: it will be enough to put admin / admin then correctly put your market account
index.md.pour que votre Jeedom recovery puisse re: so that your jeedom recovery can restore the internal memory of the box
index.md.dans la partie Wifi du plugin vous pouve: in the Wifi part of the plugin you can check the Hotspot box which will allow you to create a wifi access point on your Box Atlas
index.md.DNS et forwarding IP (pont entre etherne: DNS and IP forwarding (bridge between ethernet and wifi) functional on it
